short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch a Chromium-based browser for extension install and removal events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This debugging aid will watch all browser extension installs, uninstalls, enables and disables, regardless of source (e.g. user action, side-loading, Group Policy Update, etc).
